argument.name: system_mode
argument.description: One of the values from the Mode column in the table below.

argument.name: system_setting
argument.description: The value from the Setting column, in the table below, that corresponds to the Mode selection.

page.discussion: The A5.SYSTEM_MODE_SET() method sets a configurable aspect of the Alpha Five environment. The various values for Mode and Setting are:

item.name: code_editor_auto_help
item.description: Nocolor, Turns off color coding in the Code Editor.

item.name: interactive_auto_help
item.description: Nocomplete, Turns off auto-complete in the Interactive window.

item.name: expression_auto_help
item.description: Nohelp, Turns off auto-complete in the Expression Builder.

item.name: data_entry_style
item.description: Modal, Sets the default data entry style to "Modal".

item.name: sys_metric_textedit_leftpad
item.description: Number, Sets the left padding of Xdialog text edit controls in pixels.

item.name: control_panel_refresh_check
item.description: True/False, Enables and disables continuous refresh of the Control Panel.

item.name: xbasic_error_event_log
item.description: t Causes extended debugging information to be written to the standard Windows event log when an Xbasic script error occurs. To view the Windows event log, click Start > Control Panel > Administrative Tools > Event Viewer.

item.name: statusbar_refresh_rate
item.description: Number, Sets the status bar refresh rate in seconds. For example ".01" will update the StatusBar every .01 seconds. ".1" will update the StatusBar every .1 seconds.

section.title: Setting the Left Padding for Xdialog Text Controls
section.description: To set the left padding to 50 pixels.

section.title: Control Panel Refresh
section.description: Alpha Anywhere's default behavior now disables continuous refresh of the Control Panel. This setting can now be controlled in the Settings dialog box (select View > Settings > Preferences > Advanced > Control Panel ). As a result of this change, there may be some cases where the Control Panel is slow to update and does not immediately reflect some new object that has been added to the database.
